name: F.Y.I: This is a T.E.S.T.
description:
F.Y.I: This is a T.E.S.T. is an interactive horror experience created in 48 hours for the Shitty Horror Game Jam. It is my first game submitted to a game jam. Now with 4K UHD support.

== CONTROLS ==

Use WASD to move

Use mouse to look around

Press F1 to quit

Press F4 to replay

Press çtì£∟├Ñú?.Ä to )1τ♂§£•X

Press E to interact
